charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1101_0100_2:
Kiawe performed his fire dance
for [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1101_0200_2: His vigorous dancing was really intense!
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_0300_1: So, what did you think of my fire dance?
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0401_0500_1: Thank you! I’m glad to hear that!
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0402_0700_1: Thank you! I’m glad to hear that!
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_0800_1: But my dancing is still not where it needs to be.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_0900_1: I have to keep practicing to master it.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_1000_1: I see Marowak agrees with me.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_1100_1:
We’ve been dancing partners ever since we met,
you know.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_1200_1:
Once I start practicing, Marowak just naturally
starts to dance with me.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0401_1400_1:
Yeah, Marowak looks like he has a lot of fun
when we dance together.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0302_1500_1: Marowak must be really into dancing!
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0402_1600_1:
Yeah, Marowak always looks really serious when
we dance together.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_1700_1:
It’s all thanks to Marowak that I’m able to continue
practicing every day without fail.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0401_1900_1:
There was a time when I was in a bit of a slump
in my role as a Captain.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0402_2100_1:
There was a time when I was in a bit of a slump
in my role as a Captain.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_2200_1:
I felt like I had plateaued and couldn’t improve
my dance.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_2300_1:
I just didn’t feel like dancing, and I couldn’t even
bring myself to start practicing. Then, Marowak
approached me and passed me his torch.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_2400_1:
I felt that he was trying to cheer me up and let
me know that he wanted to dance with me again.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0401_2600_1:
Yeah. At the time, I was dancing solely to deepen
my understanding of the Alolan people
and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0302_2700_1:
And that’s how you got over
your slump?
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0402_2800_1:
Yeah. At the time, I was dancing solely to deepen
my understanding of the Alolan people
and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_2900_1:
But thanks to Marowak, I realized that my reasons
for dancing don’t have to be that complicated.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_3000_1:
Maybe it’s OK to dance because I want to dance
with a friend.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_3500_1:
I promise that one day, we’ll show you a dance
even better than the one we just performed! Just
like my grandpa used to!
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_3600_1:
But in order to do that, I need to practice
even more.
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_1201_3700_1:
I know! Why don’t we dance
together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0401_3900_1: Great! Let’s turn up the heat!
charaepi_ch0149_00_kaki/2301_0402_4100_1: Great! Let’s turn up the heat!
